title-english: Evacuation of British Troops and Freedom of the Press
creator: Shafik, Doria
description-english: This article talks about freedom of the press which was brought back to life on the very day that the last British soldier stepped out of Egypt after almost 74 of occupation.
description-arabic: تتحدث المقالة عن تزامن استعادة الصحافة حريتها مع إعلان الجلاء وتحرير البلاد من براثن الاستعمار الأجنبي بخروج جندي بريطاني عن مصر بعد 74 عامًا تقريبًا.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Evacuation of British Troops and Freedom of the Press
rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
